mapper.select:
SELECT rnum, poi_no, emp_id, poi_insp_qty, poi_pas_itm_qty, poi_mis_itm_qty, poi_dmg_qty, poi_etc_qty, poi_acp, poi_lbl_itm_qty FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, poi_no, emp_id, poi_insp_qty, poi_pas_itm_qty, poi_mis_itm_qty, poi_dmg_qty, poi_etc_qty, poi_acp, poi_lbl_itm_qty FROM ( SELECT poi_no, emp_id, poi_insp_qty, poi_pas_itm_qty, poi_mis_itm_qty, poi_dmg_qty, poi_etc_qty, poi_acp, poi_lbl_itm_qty FROM tb_insp_lbl ORDER BY poi_no DESC )
)
